ruling: - If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a "Batteryman" monster, this card's Trigger Effect can be chained to. After the Trigger Effect resolves, [[Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Dragon]] then has the appropriate effect applied to it. So if you Tributed [[Batteryman D]], the opponent may activate [[Trap Hole]] as a chain to the effect of [[Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Dragon]] and destroy [[Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Dragon]] before it can negate the effects of Spell & Trap Cards that target it. (In other words, by chaining to the effect that would give [[Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Dragon]] immunity, you can destroy it before it becomes immune.)
- You can activate [[Divine Wrath]] when this card is Tribute Summoned if a "Batteryman" monster was Tributed.
